page.shortlink: api sql namespace row snapshot class insert data function
page.description: Inserts a column value into the data collection just prior to the row specified by the argument named InsertBefore.
page.syntax: L InsertData (Column as SQL::ColumnValue [, InsertBefore as N = 1 ] )

argument.name: Column
argument.description: A SQL::ColumnValue that specifies the value and name of the column to insert.

argument.name: InsertBefore
argument.description: Optional. Default value is 1. Specifies what row to insert the column before.

page.discussion: Returns true if the column was inserted and false if there was an error.
